response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to us. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled benefits and experiences. Considering its quality and the value it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7,200.
